title: The National (band)
summary: The National is an American rock band of Cincinnati, Ohio natives, formed in Brooklyn, New York City in 1999.[1] The band consists of Matt Berninger (vocals), Aaron Dessner (guitar, piano, keyboards), Bryce Dessner (guitar, piano, keyboards), Scott Devendorf (bass) and Bryan Devendorf (drums). Carin Besser is not a band member, but has written lyrics for the band alongside her husband, Berninger, since its 2007 album Boxer.[2]
